评论详情: A mi hijo le quedo super

This is very comfy, high quality, and fits me really well! I got a mens large for it to be baggy, should have gone w medium but thats okay lol. It looks very good on me, gives that streewear vibes. Very flattering overall and the matieral is incredible. Feels like a vaseball jersey.

this is a men's size and im a woman so it does not work for my curves, but i can speak on the sizing (true to size), color (true to image), and the feel of the fabric. the feel of the fabric is what did it for me -- im so excited to make this shirt my own. it is sooo soft. i literally recommend you buy this just to feel the shirt fabric. if you return it, it won't be for the way it feels to the touch
I like this shirt my only dislike is the fabric it's buttery but not in a good way. Seems a bit too cheap in my head.
